oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greetings from On Maneuvers in Tennessee, circa 1942
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front of a black and white postcard, circa 1942, depicting WWII military maneuvers in Tennessee, from official photographs of the U. S. Army and Marine Corps. Between September 1942 and March 1944 nearly one million soldiers trained in the Tennessee Maneuvers area, located in Middle Tennessee. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States. Army--Maneuvers
